title: So Internet Explorer is getting phased out.
body:
It's had a decent run, but it was obsolete and needed to go. Thoughts on this? Also, any thoughts on Project Spartan, which will replace the aging browser?

Source: http://www.npr.org/blogs/thetwo-way/2015/03/18/393914128/microsoft-is-phasing-out-internet-explorer
http://www.theverge.com/2015/3/17/8230631/microsoft-is-killing-off-the-internet-explorer-brand
http://www.usatoday.com/story/tech/2015/03/17/microsoft-internet-explorer-project-spartan/24909091/
